a complex, intricate or difficult condition.
a control, check or restraint.
any device used to catch something (as the fish-angle, net, etc.).
the quality of being troublesome, wicked or harmful; mischievousness; wickedness.
the condition of hair, thread being entangled.
any device, as a hook, angle, etc. to catch a prey.
blockage of urine caused by a bodily disorder.
a kind of net used for catching birds and other animals.
a seal which is usedmark documents officially; a signet.
a finger-ring with a special royal sign or mark used to attest letters, documents, etc.
a stamped monetary coin, metal, etc.
a kind of small, flat piece of metal with a design or inscription stamped or inscribed on it worn around the neck by a Vīraśaiva pontiff assuming that position.
a military-police officer.
